1050330.name: Ambient DM
1050330.description:
Ambient DM is the next step in immersion at your tabletop. A DM tool to make sound boards that enhance your tabletop gaming sessions. Bring your D&D and Pathfinder game sessions to life!

Dungeon Master, Game Master or just setting the mood while playing your favorite board game, Ambient DM gives you the ability to captivate your player with Music, Sound Effects and Voice Elements.

Change the pitch to make the sound element suit your needs. Build entire sound boards that you can save and load for future use. Play multiple sound banks at once to make the perfect atmosphere for your setting.

Ambient DM contains:


  • Over 95 Full Songs
  • 1100+ sound effects
  • More Than 700 voice elements.

Enhance your tabletop gaming experiences with Ambient DM!
1050330.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
